home.title: Make Your Website Accessible to Everyone
home.subtitle: Get instant accessibility insights with our advanced AI-powered scanner. Ensure your website meets WCAG 2.1 standards and create an inclusive digital experience for all users.

about.title: Making the Web Accessible, One Scan at a Time
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to make digital accessibility testing as simple as checking your email. Because everyone deserves to access the web, regardless of their abilities.
about.readyToMake: Ready to Make Your Website Accessible?
about.joinThousands: Join thousands of developers and designers who are already using ScanWeb to create more inclusive digital experiences.
